default.name: Nicolas A
default.review: We chose VirtoCommerce for Lavazza because it is the only ecommerce platform that has the functionality, flexibility, and scalability we need - today and long-term

default.name: Dmitry M
default.review: Virto Commerce let us reduce the number of people involved in management of promotions from six to one. We don't depend on IT guys anymore, and everybody benefits from this

default.name: Andreas K
default.review: Scalable open source e-commerce platform in the (Azure) cloud for companies that want to be unique

default.title: Get access to customers and deeply integrate with them
default.subtitle: Bosch wanted a direct line of communication with their customer base. To gain this important customer access, they decided to create a customer loyalty program that awarded points and ultimately allowed them to interact directly with their customers.

settings.label: Title
settings.default: All you need in one place

default.title: Conditional Promotions
default.text: Flexible promotion module provides the right targeted incentives to specific customers for certain products or categories.

default.title: Coupons & Tracking
default.text: Use promo codes and coupons to run targeted promotions, and easily track the results and revenue for each coupon.

default.title: Minimum Advertised Price (MAP) Support Tools
default.text: Ensure that third party sellers are not hurting your brand by selling your products at prices lower than they should be.

default.title: Customer Segmenting
default.text: Leverage the flexibility to segment your customers endlessly, ensuring they received promotions targeted exactly to their wants and needs.
